kulami.game.player

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • kulami.game.player.Player
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CompPlayer, HumanPlayer

    public abstract class Player
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents the local player in a Kulami game.

    gordon
